00021 #ifndef RIGHTPART_H
00022 #define RIGHTPART_H

00031 #include <iostream>
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 #include "Visitor.h"
00035 
00040 class RightPart
00041 {
00042  public:
00047   virtual void accept(Visitor *) = 0;
00048   friend ostream & operator<<(ostream & out, const RightPart & rp);
00049   virtual void printMe(ostream &) const = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00055 class TerminalRightPart : public RightPart
00056 {
00057  public:
00058   TerminalRightPart(Terminal * term) : theTerminal(term) {}
00059   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00060   void accept(Visitor *v) { 
00061     return v->visitTerminal(theTerminal);
00062   }
00063  private:
00064   Terminal * theTerminal;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00071 class NonTerminalRightPart : public RightPart
00072 {
00073  public:
00074   NonTerminalRightPart(NonTerminal * nonterm) : nonTerminal(nonterm) {}
00075   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00076   void accept(Visitor *v) { 
00077     return v->visitNonTerminal(nonTerminal); 
00078   }
00079  private:
00080   NonTerminal * nonTerminal;
00081 };

00085 class UnionRightPart : public RightPart
00086 {
00087  public:
00088   UnionRightPart(RightPart * left, RightPart * right)
00089     : rp1(left), rp2(right) {}
00090   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00091   void accept(Visitor *v) { 
00092     return v->visitUnion(rp1,rp2); 
00093   }
00094  private:
00095   RightPart *rp1, *rp2;  
00096 }; 
00097 
00100 class ConcatRightPart : public RightPart
00101 {
00102  public:
00103   ConcatRightPart(RightPart * left, RightPart * right)
00104     : rp1(left), rp2(right) {}
00105   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00106   void accept(Visitor *v) { return v->visitConcat(rp1,rp2); }
00107  private:
00108   RightPart *rp1, *rp2;  
00109 };

00114 class KleeneClosureRightPart : public RightPart
00115 {
00116  public:
00117   KleeneClosureRightPart(RightPart * cld) : closed(cld) {}
00118   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00119   void accept(Visitor *v) { return v->visitKleeneClosure(closed); }
00120  private:
00121   RightPart *closed;

00128 {

00141 class OptionRightPart : public RightPart
00142 {

00155 class EmptyRightPart : public RightPart
00156 {
00157  public:
00159   static EmptyRightPart * Instance()  {
00160     static EmptyRightPart theInstance;
00161     return &theInstance;
00162   }
00163   void printMe(ostream & out) const ;
00164   void accept(Visitor *v) { return v->visitEmpty(); }
00165  private:
00167   EmptyRightPart()  {}
00168 };
